alert.note: Alert for Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 31 at 6:16AM PST until February 01 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of northwest California, including the following areas, Northeastern Mendocino Interior and Southern Trinity. * WHEN...Through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...There will be an increased risk of rock and land slides along roadways. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Three to six inches of rain is expected very early Wednesday through Wednesday night. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
